price: Kae εberε a Meyi kyerεε Asuafoͻ no sε: “Monye Me ni na monye Me Somafoͻ no nso ni. Wͻ’kaa sε: “Y’agye adi, enti di ho adanseε sε, yε’deε yε’yε Muslimifoͻ”.
arabic: وَإِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡتُ إِلَى ٱلۡحَوَارِيِّـۧنَ أَنۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِي وَبِرَسُولِي قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَٱشۡهَدۡ بِأَنَّنَا مُسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh awḥaytu ilā al-ḥawāriyīna an āminū bī wabirasūlī qālū āmannā wa-ish'had bi-annanā mus'limūna
